roleset.name: slide over snow, probably on skis
roleset.note: SKI-V NOTES: Member of Vncls vehicle-51.4.1-1. (from ski.01-v)
SKIING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, ski-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls vehicle-51.4.1-1. (from skiing.01-n)

example.name: usually intransitive
example.text: Some have built health spas, business centers and shopping villages so visitors-1 have more to do than *trace*-1 ski .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: two kilometers later Hummer approached Engenvick and they skied together the rest of the way .

example.name: both args
example.text: Scott is completely concentrating on his skiing down a challenging slope.
